description:
euca_deregister fails with error, and objectstore logs "exceptions.AttributeError: ImageResource instance has no attribute 'get_argument'"

This is caused by an incomplete refactoring in cset 140.4.2 (twisted branch).
title: euca_deregister fails with error and objectstore logs 'exceptions.AttributeError: ImageResource instance has no attribute 'get_argument''
